name: Running Out Of Tiles
description:
Collect tiles to create floor to run on.

This was my LD39 entry, more of an engine demo than a full game.

Keyboard / x360 controller:
A / A : jump
S / LT : run
D / B :  collect
Space / X : create

F4 : full screen
ESC : quit

Psst... There's a secret ending!

Intro music by Em!

Game made with LÖVE, 
levels with Tiled,
graphics with Aseprite,
and musics with Bosca Ceoil.

Ludum dare entry page.
